alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 24 at 4:02AM AKDT until March 27 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 13 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze possible. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Watch, from Saturday morning through Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause extensive damage and power lines. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
